verses.verse: To the chief Musician, <S%H5329><s%> Maschil, <S%H4905><s%> A Psalm of David, <S%H1732><s%> when Doeg <S%H1673><s%> the Edomite <S%H130><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, David <S%H1732><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ahimelech. <S%H288><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> boastest thou thyself <S%H1984><s%> in mischief, <S%H7451><s%> O mighty man? <S%H1368><s%> the goodness <S%H2617><s%> of God <S%H410><s%> endureth continually. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
Thy tongue <S%H3956><s%> deviseth <S%H2803><s%> mischiefs; <S%H1942><s%> like a sharp <S%H3913><s%> razor, <S%H8593><s%> working <S%H6213><s%> deceitfully. <S%H7423><s%>

Thou lovest <S%H157><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> more than good; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2896><s%> and lying <S%H8267><s%> rather than to speak <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1696><s%> righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Thou lovest <S%H157><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> devouring <S%H1105><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> O thou deceitful <S%H4820><s%> tongue. <S%H3956><s%>

God <S%H410><s%> shall likewise <S%H1571><s%> destroy <S%H5422><s%> thee forever, <S%H5331><s%> he shall take thee away, <S%H2846><s%> and pluck thee out <S%H5255><s%> of thy dwelling place, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H168><s%> and root <S%H8327><s%> thee out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> also shall see, <S%H7200><s%> and fear, <S%H3372><s%> and shall laugh <S%H7832><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> him:

Lo, <S%H2009><s%> this is the man <S%H1397><s%> that made <S%H7760><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> God <S%H430><s%> his strength; <S%H4581><s%> but trusted <S%H982><s%> in the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of his riches, <S%H6239><s%> and strengthened <S%H5810><s%> himself in his wickedness. <S%H1942><s%>

But I <S%H589><s%> am like a green <S%H7488><s%> olive tree <S%H2132><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of God: <S%H430><s%> I trust <S%H982><s%> in the mercy <S%H2617><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>

I will praise <S%H3034><s%> thee forever, <S%H5769><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> it: and I will wait on <S%H6960><s%> thy name; <S%H8034><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it is good <S%H2896><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> thy saints. <S%H2623><s%>
